doc.after: The unauthorised juvenile productions of Pinafore were so popular that Carte mounted his own children s version played at matinees at the Opera Comique beginning on 16 December 1879 82 Fran ois Cellier who had taken over from his brother as Carte s music director in London adapted the score for children s voices 59 Between its two Christmas seasons in London the children s production went on a provincial tour from 2 August 1880 to 11 December 1880 83
